titles.title: Charles "Pete" Conrad Astronomy Awards Act
National Aeronautics and Space Act
Charles "Pete" Conrad Astronomy Awards Act
National Aeronautics and Space Act
Charles "Pete" Conrad Astronomy Awards Act
National Aeronautics and Space Act
Charles "Pete" Conrad Astronomy Awards Act
National Aeronautics and Space Act
Charles "Pete" Conrad Astronomy Awards Act
National Aeronautics and Space Act
Charles "Pete" Conrad Astronomy Awards Act
National Aeronautics and Space Act
To enact certain laws relating to national and commercial space programs as title 51, United States Code, "National and Commercial Space Programs".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 111-325.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 127.

action.text: Mr. Cohen moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3237.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Leahy without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 371.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 12/18/2010--Public Law. Enacts title 51 of the United States Code into positive law to be entitled "National and Commercial Space Programs." Makes conforming changes to existing law and repeals specified provisions of specified laws.
